channel.title: Movie Script
channel.description:
Hey everyone, i need this movie script reviewed.
Tell me what you think, what needs improving, what needs changing, etc.
And be quick, cause i need to make the actual movie in 1.5 weeks, kinda left it a bit late i know.
- Procrastination Lv 99
The movie needs to encorparate the letter U in it, that is the only restriction, that and it cant go for more than 8 min. Thats why the U is there.
The part where it has the crappy pictures if where it changes from actual people, to the PitFall game graphics. Basicaly the character will go across the 3 screens in Pitfall, pick up the key, and leave. This will be done in flash, they are being made as you read this.

Hey everyone, i need this movie script reviewed.

Tell me what you think, what needs improving, what needs changing, etc.

And be quick, cause i need to make the actual movie in 1.5 weeks, kinda left it a bit late i know.

The movie needs to encorparate the letter U in it, that is the only restriction, that and it cant go for more than 8 min. Thats why the U is there.

The part where it has the crappy pictures if where it changes from actual people, to the PitFall game graphics. Basicaly the character will go across the 3 screens in Pitfall, pick up the key, and leave. This will be done in flash, they are being made as you read this.
